title: Impeachment Inquiry Polling, USMCA, Jobs
itunes:title: Impeachment Inquiry Polling, USMCA, Jobs
description:
Panel guests: Former Georgia Congressman and Trump 2020 campaign surrogate Jack Kingston, Political reporter for Morning Consult Eli Yokley, and Pedro Da Costa, director of communications at the Economic Policy Institute. The panel discussed House speaker Nancy Pelosi’s exclusive interview wiht Bloomberg, Friday’s jobs report, 2020 politics, the impeachment inquiry and recent polling about the how the democrats are handling it. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
